alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 4:27PM CDT until June 14 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Tensas Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northeastern Concordia Parish in northeastern Louisiana... East central Catahoula Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 425 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wisner, or 15 miles southeast of Winnsboro, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Cooter Point around 435 PM CDT. Waterproof and Helena around 440 PM CDT. St. Joseph around 445 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
